title: The Craghold Legacy
description: Craghold. The rambling old resort hotel in the hills had seen many strange guests in its history—and its staff, too, was unusual, from the suave manager who shunned the sunlight to the porter not everyone saw.Anne Fenner came to Craghold for a rest—but danger and terror awaited her there, together with adventure and romance. For Craghold had been waiting for Anne…The Craghold Legacy is the first of a series of suspenseful novels in the unique setting of Craghold—the unforgettable old house of many secrets. Perfect for fans of Stephen King and Lauren Beukes.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 'Truly it is awe-inspiring how much adventure is packed into a slim 150 pages. Even more miraculous, it doesn't feel rushed' - Justin Tate, Goodreads reviewer.
author: Edwina Noone
